org.jpac.plc

Class PlcString

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpac.plc.PlcString

  • public class PlcString
extends java.lang.Object
    represents a plc string
    a plc string consists of a byte array containing the string
    and 2 additional maintenance bytes, used to store the maximum and current length of the string

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      PlcString(byte[] string, int actualLength)

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlcString

        public PlcString(java.lang.String string,
         int maxLength)
          throws StringLengthException
        Parameters:
        string - the java string to be stored as a plc string
        maxLength - the maximum length of the plc string

        StringLengthException

      • PlcString

        public PlcString(byte[] string,
         int actualLength)
          throws StringLengthException
        Parameters:
        string - an array of bytes to be stored as a plc string
        actualLength - the actual length of the plc string (the maximum length is deduce from string.length)
        Throws:
        StringLengthException
